channel.title: CVE Feed for [UNKNOWN] -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for [UNKNOWN] -- all products

item.title: CVE-2019-14883|2024-08-05T00:26:39.123Z -- %5Bunknown%5D -- moodle
item.description: A vulnerability was found in Moodle 3.6 before 3.6.7 and 3.7 before 3.7.3, where tokens used to fetch inline atachments in email notifications were not disabled when a user's account was no longer active. Note: to access files, a user would need to know the file path, and their token.

item.title: CVE-2019-14853|2024-08-05T00:26:39.175Z -- %5Bunknown%5D -- python-ecdsa
item.description: An error-handling flaw was found in python-ecdsa before version 0.13.3. During signature decoding, malformed DER signatures could raise unexpected exceptions (or no exceptions at all), which could lead to a denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2019-14890|2024-08-05T00:26:39.098Z -- %5Bunknown%5D -- tower
item.description: A vulnerability was found in Ansible Tower before 3.6.1 where an attacker with low privilege could retrieve usernames and passwords credentials from the new RHSM saved in plain text into the database at '/api/v2/config' when applying the Ansible Tower license.

item.title: CVE-2019-14856|2024-08-05T00:26:39.119Z -- %5Bunknown%5D -- ansible
item.description: ansible before versions 2.8.6, 2.7.14, 2.6.20 is vulnerable to a None

item.title: CVE-2019-14824|2024-08-05T00:26:39.128Z -- %5Bunknown%5D -- 389-ds-base
item.description: A flaw was found in the 'deref' plugin of 389-ds-base where it could use the 'search' permission to display attribute values. In some configurations, this could allow an authenticated attacker to view private attributes, such as password hashes.

item.title: CVE-2019-14884|2024-08-05T00:26:39.172Z -- %5Bunknown%5D -- moodle
item.description: A vulnerability was found in Moodle 3.7 before 3.73, 3.6 before 3.6.7 and 3.5 before 3.5.9, where a reflected XSS possible from some fatal error messages.

item.title: CVE-2019-14842|2024-08-05T00:26:39.105Z -- %5Bunknown%5D -- libnbd
item.description: Structured reply is a feature of the newstyle NBD protocol allowing the server to send a reply in chunks. A bounds check which was supposed to test for chunk offsets smaller than the beginning of the request did not work because of signed/unsigned confusion. If one of these chunks contains a negative offset then data under control of the server is written to memory before the read buffer supplied by the client. If the read buffer is located on the stack then this allows the stack return address from nbd_pread() to be trivially modified, allowing arbitrary code execution under the control of the server. If the buffer is located on the heap then other memory objects before the buffer can be overwritten, which again would usually lead to arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2019-14882|2024-08-05T00:26:39.160Z -- %5Bunknown%5D -- moodle
item.description: A vulnerability was found in Moodle 3.7 to 3.7.3, 3.6 to 3.6.7, 3.5 to 3.5.9 and earlier where an open redirect existed in the Lesson edit page.

item.title: CVE-2019-14879|2024-08-05T00:26:39.133Z -- %5Bunknown%5D -- moodle
item.description: A vulnerability was found in Moodle versions 3.7.x before 3.7.3, 3.6.x before 3.6.7 and 3.5.x before 3.5.9. When a cohort role assignment was removed, the associated capabilities were not being revoked (where applicable).

item.title: CVE-2019-14881|2024-08-05T00:26:39.145Z -- %5Bunknown%5D -- moodle
item.description: A vulnerability was found in moodle 3.7 before 3.7.3, where there is blind XSS reflected in some locations where user email is displayed.

item.title: CVE-2019-14880|2024-08-05T00:26:39.160Z -- %5Bunknown%5D -- moodle
item.description: A vulnerability was found in Moodle versions 3.7 before 3.7.3, 3.6 before 3.6.7, 3.5 before 3.5.9 and earlier. OAuth 2 providers who do not verify users' email address changes require additional verification during sign-up to reduce the risk of account compromise.

item.title: CVE-2019-14860|2024-08-05T00:26:39.101Z -- %5Bunknown%5D -- syndesis
item.description: It was found that the Syndesis configuration for Cross-Origin Resource Sharing was set to allow all origins. An attacker could use this lack of protection to conduct phishing attacks and further access unauthorized information.

item.title: CVE-2019-14857|2024-08-05T00:26:39.151Z -- %5Bunknown%5D -- mod_auth_openidc
item.description: A flaw was found in mod_auth_openidc before version 2.4.0.1. An open redirect issue exists in URLs with trailing slashes similar to CVE-2019-3877 in mod_auth_mellon.

item.title: CVE-2019-14894|2024-08-05T00:26:39.132Z -- %5Bunknown%5D -- cloudforms
item.description: A flaw was found in the CloudForms management engine version 5.10 and CloudForms management version 5.11, which triggered remote code execution through NFS schedule backup. An attacker logged into the management console could use this flaw to execute arbitrary shell commands on the CloudForms server as root.

item.title: CVE-2019-14902|2024-08-05T00:26:39.142Z -- %5Bunknown%5D -- samba
item.description: There is an issue in all samba 4.11.x versions before 4.11.5, all samba 4.10.x versions before 4.10.12 and all samba 4.9.x versions before 4.9.18, where the removal of the right to create or modify a subtree would not automatically be taken away on all domain controllers.

item.title: CVE-2019-14865|2024-08-05T00:26:39.094Z -- %5Bunknown%5D -- grub2
item.description: A flaw was found in the grub2-set-bootflag utility of grub2. A local attacker could run this utility under resource pressure (for example by setting RLIMIT), causing grub2 configuration files to be truncated and leaving the system unbootable on subsequent reboots.
